00027       INT8                          bVisible;
00028 
00029       //This is the chance associated with an item or a trap not-existing in the world.  The reason why 
00030       //this is reversed (10 meaning item has 90% chance of appearing, is because the order that the map 
00031       //is saved, we don't know if the version is older or not until after the items are loaded and added.
00032       //Because this value is zero in the saved maps, we can't change it to 100, hence the reversal method.
00033       //This check is only performed the first time a map is loaded.  Later, it is entirely skipped.
00034       UINT8                         ubNonExistChance;  
00035 
00036 } WORLDITEM;
